[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [IPackageJson](./node-core-library.ipackagejson.md)

## IPackageJson interface

An interface for accessing common fields from a package.json file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IPackageJson extends INodePackageJson
```

**Extends:** [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md)

## Remarks

This interface describes a package.json file format whose `name` and `version` field are required. In some situations, the `version` field is optional; in that case, use the [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) interface instead.

More fields may be added to this interface in the future. For documentation about the package.json file format, see the [CommonJS Packages specification](http://wiki.commonjs.org/wiki/Packages/1.0) and the [NPM manual page](https://docs.npmjs.com/files/package.json) .

| Property                                                                              | Modifiers | Type                                                                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [bin?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.bin.md)                                   |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The main entry point for the package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                           |
| [dependencies?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.dependencies.md)                 |           | [IPackageJsonDependencyTable](./node-core-library.ipackagejsondependencytable.md) | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An array of dependencies that must always be installed for this package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                        |
| [description?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.description.md)                   |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> A brief description of the package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                             |
| [devDependencies?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.devdependencies.md)           |           | [IPackageJsonDependencyTable](./node-core-library.ipackagejsondependencytable.md) | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An array of dependencies that must only be installed for developers who will build this package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                |
| [homepage?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.homepage.md)                         |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The URL to the project's web page.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                              |
| [license?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.license.md)                           |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The name of the license.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                        |
| [main?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.main.md)                                 |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The path to the module file that will act as the main entry point.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                              |
| [name](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.name.md)                                  |           | string                                                                            | <p>The name of the package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                                          |
| [optionalDependencies?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.optionaldependencies.md) |           | [IPackageJsonDependencyTable](./node-core-library.ipackagejsondependencytable.md) | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An array of optional dependencies that may be installed for this package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                       |
| [peerDependencies?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.peerdependencies.md)         |           | [IPackageJsonDependencyTable](./node-core-library.ipackagejsondependencytable.md) | <p><i>(Optional)</i> An array of dependencies that must be installed by a consumer of this package, but which will not be automatically installed by this package.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                   |
| [private?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.private.md)                           |           | boolean                                                                           | <p><i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether this package is allowed to be published or not.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                               |
| [repository?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.repository.md)                     |           | string \| [IPackageJsonRepository](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonrepository.md) | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The URL of the project's repository.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                            |
| [resolutions?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.resolutions.md)                   |           | Record&lt;string, string&gt;                                                      | <p><i>(Optional)</i> A table of package version resolutions. This feature is only implemented by the Yarn package manager.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                           |
| [scripts?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.scripts.md)                           |           | [IPackageJsonScriptTable](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonscripttable.md)         | <p><i>(Optional)</i> A table of script hooks that a package manager or build tool may invoke.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                        |
| [tsdocMetadata?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.tsdocmetadata.md)               |           | string                                                                            | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> The path to the TSDoc metadata file. This is still being standardized: https://github.com/microsoft/tsdoc/issues/7\#issuecomment-442271815</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p> |
| [types?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.types.md)                               |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> The path to the TypeScript \*.d.ts file describing the module file that will act as the main entry point.</p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                       |
| [typings?](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.typings.md)                           |           | string                                                                            | <p><i>(Optional)</i> Alias for <code>types</code></p><p>(Inherited from [INodePackageJson](./node-core-library.inodepackagejson.md) )</p>                                                                                                                                    |
| [version](./node-core-library.ipackagejson.version.md)                                |           | string                                                                            | A version number conforming to the Semantic Versioning (SemVer) standard.                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
